C

CL_INSIDE - Static variable in class gametools.Area
Collision when the first object is completely within the second.
CL_INSIDE_X - Static variable in class gametools.Area
Collision when the first object is completely within the second horizontally, no matter the vertical position.
CL_INSIDE_Y - Static variable in class gametools.Area
Collision when the first object is completely within the second vertically, no matter the horizontal position.
CL_TOUCH - Static variable in class gametools.Area
Collision when the first object has any point within the second.
CL_TOUCH_X - Static variable in class gametools.Area
Collision when the first object has any point within the second horizontally, no matter the vertical position.
CL_TOUCH_Y - Static variable in class gametools.Area
Collision when the first object has any point within the second vertically, no matter the horizontal position.
clear() - Method in class gametools.SpriteGroup
Empties the group of all elements.

Bottom left corner.
CR_BOTTOMRIGHT - Static variable in class gametools.Sprite

CR_TOPLEFT - Static variable in class gametools.Sprite
Top left corner.
CR_TOPRIGHT - Static variable in class gametools.Sprite
Top right corner.
create() - Method in class gametools.Game
Initializes the game and creates the window.
